messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] argumentative paper on the samurai
messages.msgSnippet: I think both topics are very interesting. However if you do the Meiji Restoration and Samurai Rebelions of 1876-1877 you with have a more defined topic. The
messages.messageBody:
I think both topics are very interesting. However if
you do the Meiji Restoration and Samurai Rebelions of
1876-1877 you with have a more defined topic. The
Begining of the Buke and their rise to prominance in
Japan covers much of the Heian Period. Were as the
last years of the Tokugawa Shogunate, Meiji
Restoration and Satsuma Rebelion is more defined and
more accurate information is available. Your talking
several decades as appossed to several centuries.

But its your paper you do what you feel your most
comfortable with.
--- coeli jimenez <coeli_tensai@...> wrote:
> hi..
>
> i need some help. i am supposed to write an
> argumentative paper for my language class. my chosen
> topic is:
>
> Which is better, the "original" samurai (those who
> started the military class) or the "last" samurai
> (tokugawa to meiji eras)?
>
> can anybody help me please? i need facts and notes,
> as well as ideas about the whole thing. i would
> appreciate it if you can email me personally..
>
> thank you.
>
>
> Coeli
>

messages.messageBody:
i just realized that this is a hard topic. you have any ideas on "samurai vs. knights"?

burker1@... wrote:Better in what sense? Militarily? As individual fighters? Or in having a sense of honor and/or in following Bushido?

Bob Burke

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] argumentative paper on the samurai
messages.msgSnippet: My first objection would be...: were the Tokugawa/Meiji samurai the last ones? What about WWII ?? Anyway, I would look in the University video department
messages.messageBody:
My first 'objection'' would be...: were the Tokugawa/Meiji samurai the
last ones? What about WWII ??

Anyway, I would look in the University video department for J.Mass'
lecture titled: "1000 Years of the Samurai." It's on video, some 55
mins, and covers it all.

By the way, I believe many on this list would like to check that out. I
have it on mpeg, but its like 600MB. maybe I can share it on
Limewire... Any other idea? It is, indeed, excellent material.
cepo

messages.subject: argumentative paper on the samurai
messages.msgSnippet: hi.. i need some help. i am supposed to write an argumentative paper for my language class. my chosen topic is: Which is better, the original samurai (those
messages.messageBody:
hi..

i need some help. i am supposed to write an argumentative paper for my language class. my chosen topic is:

Which is better, the "original" samurai (those who started the military class) or the "last" samurai (tokugawa to meiji eras)?

can anybody help me please? i need facts and notes, as well as ideas about the whole thing. i would appreciate it if you can email me personally..

thank you.


Coeli
